name: Boom Moon
description:
Instrucions to defuse:

  • Click the gray plug of a cable and move it to a free hole, THE UP LEFT GRAY HOLE IS FREE.
  • You can only have ONE PLUG OUT IN HAND. You can hit other plugs and unplug them.
  • Repeat until every cable matches his hole color!
  • The countdown goes on as long as all cables are not plugged in.
  • The web version does not allow a video explosion when you lose :(

Gamemodes:

  • In fast mode: the countdown does not stop if there is a colored hole free.
  • In blind color mode: the cable does not matter, make sure the holes with the same color are connected.

Credits:

  • Made by UrbanZero and Chus.
  • Thanks to Chus for helping with the concept and making the entire OST.
